job_tasks.phrase: The Service Cloud Solution Engineer has a clear vision how AI and Agentic systems will help define the customer service of the future
job_tasks.justification: This phrase demonstrates an understanding of how AI and agentic systems can shape future customer service, indicating a business-level vision.

job_tasks.phrase: The primary goal of our team is to remove all technical objections related to Service Cloud in the sales cycle and to highlight the business value that Service Cloud can bring to any business.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly states the objective of aligning technical capabilities with business value and overcoming sales objections, which is core to understanding business context.

job_tasks.phrase: Business requirements assessment and delivery of findings including key difficulties, proposed solutions to meet business needs, and return on investment where applicable
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of understanding and translating business needs into technical solutions and demonstrating their value, a key aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Development of a technical sales strategy
job_tasks.justification: Developing a strategy for sales inherently involves understanding business goals and how technical solutions can achieve them.

job_tasks.phrase: Convey confidence in using AI within cloud based applications
job_tasks.justification: Communicating confidence in using AI within applications relates to understanding how technology serves business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Configuring and optimally demonstrating our solutions in a way that closely reflects each customer's business (tailored demonstrations)
job_tasks.justification: Tailoring demonstrations to customer business needs is a direct application of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Discussing and proposing solution architecture that includes common call centre infrastructure integration, back-office system integration, and workflow process definition
job_tasks.justification: Understanding and proposing architecture for business systems and workflows falls under business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement enablement activities (Webinars, Best Practices, Knowledge Share, etc.)
job_tasks.justification: Implementing enablement activities supports the business by sharing knowledge and best practices related to the product.

job_tasks.phrase: The Service Cloud Solution Engineer works closely with Sales teams and Service Cloud Account Executives, their peers, and product management to deliver the appropriate solution and establish credibility and trust with the customer.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration with business functions like sales and product management to deliver business-oriented solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: The Service Cloud Solution Engineer has a clear vision how AI and Agentic systems will help define the customer service of the future
job_tasks.justification: While high-level, the mention of 'Agentic systems' implies an understanding of building or interacting with such software components.

job_tasks.phrase: use their technical and/or sales skills, including the ability to solicit business requirements, develop a technical sales strategy, configure and optimally demonstrate the solutions that address these requirements and demonstrate business value.
job_tasks.justification: Configuring and demonstrating solutions implies some level of technical implementation or setup.

job_tasks.phrase: Convey confidence in using AI within cloud based applications
job_tasks.justification: This implies working with or understanding the integration of AI into existing cloud applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Configuring and optimally demonstrating our solutions in a way that closely reflects each customer's business (tailored demonstrations);
job_tasks.justification: Configuring solutions points to technical setup and customization, which is part of software development in a pre-sales context.

job_tasks.phrase: Discussing and proposing solution architecture that includes common call centre infrastructure integration, back-office system integration, and workflow process definition
job_tasks.justification: Discussing and proposing solution architecture involves understanding the components and integration of software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: The Service Cloud Solution Engineer works closely with Sales teams and Service Cloud Account Executives, their peers, and product management to deliver the appropriate solution
job_tasks.justification: Delivering a solution, even in a pre-sales context, involves technical aspects of how the product works and can be configured.

job_tasks.phrase: The Service Cloud Solution Engineer has a clear vision how AI and Agentic systems will help define the customer service of the future
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Agentic systems' suggests familiarity with systems that might involve complex operational aspects, though it's not explicitly MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: communicating a tailored view of our Service product offerings (Service Cloud) to customers and prospects.
Promoting Service Cloud value to customers (including c-level execs and IT) and field teams
Collaborate on multi-functional initiatives and with other international teams
Working well in a matrix organisation, including account executives, csg consultants and implementation partners
works closely with Sales teams and Service Cloud Account Executives, their peers, and product management
possess thought leadership, technical and business acumen, credibility and rapport.
remove all technical objections related to Service Cloud in the sales cycle and to highlight the business value that Service Cloud can bring to any business.
solicit business requirements, develop a technical sales strategy, configure and optimally demonstrate the solutions that address these requirements and demonstrate business value.
The Service Cloud Solution Engineer has a clear vision how AI and Agentic systems will help define the customer service of the future

classification.rationale: This role is primarily focused on business understanding, sales, and customer-facing demonstrations, rather than the development, fine-tuning, or MLOps of GenAI models. While AI and agentic systems are mentioned, the core responsibilities align with a technical sales or pre-sales engineering role.
